title: Ticket #1504: Filetransfer: don't create 0 length dest files when src file noexist
description:
When you specify a list of files in transfer_output_files and some of them don't exist when the job is needing to transfer all of them back in a ON_EVICT_OR_EXIT scenario and the job is going on hold, zero length destination files are created.

Before the fix to #487 happened, this would only happen for the first src file which didn't exist or had the wrong permissions. After the #487 fix went in, now it happens for all source files which are not present or have the wrong permissions.
